name: Noob Shepherd
description:
Game Developed for GMTK Game Jam 2020

Objective is to gather the  control of the sheeps, The trick is if you dont manage this in time then you will turn to warewolf with inverse controls untill you run out of time or complete the level. There are 10 levels in total. Thanks for playing please leave a feedback

Game Developed  by Serkan Kızılkan -Barış KES
